data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Intibucá, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Intibucá, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 180,854 people in the state of Intibucá who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 45 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Intibucá, Honduras.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give the 72,839 believers in the state of Intibucá the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Intibucá that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Intibucá, Honduras.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Intibucá, Honduras.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Intibucá, Honduras.

location.name: Intibucá
